info.description: The REST API provide by the core REST module.
info.title: Drupal - REST API

revision_timestamp.title: Revision create time
revision_timestamp.description: The time that the current revision was created.

revision_uid.title: Revision user
revision_uid.description: The user ID of the author of the current revision.

revision_log.title: Revision log message
revision_log.description: Briefly describe the changes you have made.

status.title: Publishing status
status.description: A boolean indicating the published state.

uid.title: Authored by
uid.description: The username of the content author.

created.title: Authored on
created.description: The time that the node was created.

changed.title: Changed
changed.description: The time that the node was last edited.

revision_translation_affected.title: Revision translation affected
revision_translation_affected.description: Indicates if the last edit of a translation belongs to current revision.

default_langcode.title: Default translation
default_langcode.description: A flag indicating whether this is the default translation.

allOf.title: node:camelids Schema
allOf.description: Describes the payload for 'node' entities of the 'camelids' bundle.

vid.title: Vocabulary
vid.description: The vocabulary to which the term is assigned.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: The weight of this term in relation to other terms.

changed.title: Changed
changed.description: The time that the term was last edited.

default_langcode.title: Default translation
default_langcode.description: A flag indicating whether this is the default translation.

allOf.title: taxonomy_term:camelids Schema
allOf.description: Describes the payload for 'taxonomy_term' entities of the 'camelids' bundle.

taxonomy_vocabulary.title: taxonomy_vocabulary Schema
taxonomy_vocabulary.description: Describes the payload for taxonomy_vocabulary entities.

preferred_langcode.title: Preferred language code
preferred_langcode.description: The user's preferred language code for receiving emails and viewing the site.

preferred_admin_langcode.title: Preferred admin language code
preferred_admin_langcode.description: The user's preferred language code for viewing administration pages.

pre_hashed.title: Determines if a password needs hashing

status.title: User status
status.description: Whether the user is active or blocked.

created.title: Created
created.description: The time that the user was created.

changed.title: Changed
changed.description: The time that the user was last edited.

access.title: Last access
access.description: The time that the user last accessed the site.

login.title: Last login
login.description: The time that the user last logged in.

init.title: Initial email
init.description: The email address used for initial account creation.

default_langcode.title: Default translation
default_langcode.description: A flag indicating whether this is the default translation.
